text: Ezɨ Ahitofel ghaze, “Nɨ mangɨ uan afeziamɨn amuir doziba ko daku, a me ataghizɨma me atrivimɨn dɨpenimɨn gara iti. Nɨ kamaghɨn damightɨ, Israelian gumazamiziba bar fogh suam, Nɨ guizbangɨra uan afeziam gamizɨ a nɨn apanimɨn oto. Eghtɨ gumazamizir datɨrɨghɨn nɨn gɨn zuiba, me nɨn gɨn mangɨsɨ bar gavgavigham.”
